item.title: ‚ÄúPlease sign the petition and share! 3 APD officers who...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚ÄúPlease sign the petition and share! 3 APD officers who re-enacted Elijah‚Äôs death, by taking photos,at the same place he was murdered; they are going in front of Aurora‚Äôs Civil Service Commission to get their jobs back 12/7. This is 2020 and they played a commonly known page from Jim Crow. These are supposed to be those that ‚Äúserve and protect‚Äù in the most diverse community in Colorado. Random acts of violence knows no affiliation. Regardless of the aisle you sit on, we can a...ll agree that a man walking home from the gas station shouldn‚Äôt be subject to murder, committing no crime. That was a son, a brother, a friend, and a light in our community. Many of us are still grieving, but we always put in the work. I‚Äôm asking everyone else to participate in the change that needs to happen. That young man was a majestic unicorn in the valleys. If you knew him, I hope you push, those who didn‚Äôt, you better.‚Äù
#JusticeForElijahMcclain

See More2433 signatures are still needed! Against the Reinstating of Aurora Police Officers in the Elijah McClain case!

change.org

Can you spare a minute to help April Young?

2433 signatures are still needed! Against the Reinstating of Aurora Police Officers in the Elijah McClain case!2433 signatures are still needed! Against the Reinstating of Aurora Police Officers in the Elijah McClain case!

item.title: We have now helped 25 families stay housed via the DD Fund! Help...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

We have now helped 25 families stay housed via the DD Fund!

Help us double that again here:
coloradogives.org/BlackLivesMatter5280
#ColoradoGivesDay #WeKeepUsSafe #MutualAid #Reparations #Covid19Relief #DisplacementDefense #BLM5280

Ari Lipscomb

I wasn‚Äôt expecting my words about how our government should be embarrassed that these people are falling through the cracks to make it in, but for the record ou...r government‚Äôs pandemic relief is embarrassing af. Super grateful to have our work featured Keezy Allen, and the abundance #BLM5280 was blessed to share with community. Looking forward to this next round and continuing the vital fight against displacement of BIPOC families in Colorado! Let‚Äôs get it.

See MoreBlack Lives Matter 5280 used a Colorado Trust grant for its rent relief program.

denverite.com

Denver‚Äôs Black Lives Matter organization has helped 13 families stay housed

Black Lives Matter 5280 used a Colorado Trust grant for its rent relief program.Black Lives Matter 5280 used a Colorado Trust grant for its rent relief program.

item.title: This aged like fine wine ‚úäüèø #BLM10`
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

This aged like fine wine ‚úäüèø
#BLM10`

Black Lives Matter 5280

#PSA: BLM5280 has nothing to do with this messaging from BLM Global Network Foundation. It reads just as out-of-tune with what's happening on the ground to us a...s it probably does to y'all. Our energy is focused on dismantling the oppressive system that murdered #BreonnaTaylor. Ain't nobody got time to be worrying about who is on the cover of Time. We are busy staying focused on supporting comrades in KY who have been on the ground for MONTHS and have told us exactly what they need. We encourage y‚Äôall to do the same by visiting the links in the comments provided by Black Lives Matter Louisville
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

See More

item.title: Y‚Äôall remember that budget that gave Denver Police two salary...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Y‚Äôall remember that budget that gave Denver Police two salary bumps that was rejected by council in October?

Yeah, the Police Union just pushed it through via arbitration meaning no council members were present to rebuke.

‚ÄúOn Monday, an arbitration hearing resulted in new contract terms that ‚Äúmirror‚Äù what the union asked for this summer, according to a press release from the Denver Police Protective Association. Spokespeople for Mayor Michael Hancock‚Äôs administration confir...med that the final terms of the contract are identical to the terms of the contract rejected by the Denver City Council in October.

The two-year contract includes a wage freeze and no paid holidays in 2021, and two pay bumps equating to 2.7 percent in 2022. Council members voted 8 to 5 against the contract, sending it to an arbitrator for a final decision.‚Äù

https://denverite.com/‚Ä¶/denver-police-officers-will-get-ra‚Ä¶/

See MoreThe final contract with the union is identical to the one first submitted to ‚Äî and rejected by ‚Äî the city council.

denverite.com

Denver police officers will get raises in 2022, arbitrator decides

The final contract with the union is identical to the one first submitted to ‚Äî and rejected by ‚Äî the city council.The final contract with the union is identical to the one first submitted to ‚Äî and rejected by ‚Äî the city council.

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Denver Alliance for Street Health ResponseSupport our organization for #GivingTuesday! Donate coloradogives.org/dashr...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Denver Alliance for Street Health Response

Support our organization for #GivingTuesday! Donate coloradogives.org/dashr to support our work.

In 2020, we‚Äôve worked relentlessly:

Building Alternatives to P...olice
‚úÖWe helped launch Denver‚Äôs first non-police 911 response with the STAR program
‚úÖWe advocated and worked to approve a non-police response in Aurora, to be launched next year with more cities in the works

Rapid Response to Urgent Community Needs
‚úÖ Continued with food distribution and meals to unhoused folks while providing first aid and support with our street medics
‚úÖProvided medic support and fostered mutual aid effort during George Floyd and Breonna Taylor protests in Denver

Transforming the Narratives of Public Safety
‚úÖLaunched the statewide CHAT: Community Healing Action and Truth effort as a truth and reconciliation process regarding hunger, systemic violence, and public safety
‚úÖParticipated in dozens of presentations and panels across the state and the country and spoke to nearly 100 businesses in Denver about not calling police

We have a lot more in store for the end of the year and beyond, so please support and donate to our efforts as we‚Äôre doing the right work at the right time: https://www.coloradogives.org/dashr

See More

item.title: ‚ñ∂ #GivingTuesday2020 Garcelle highlighting some of the dope work made possible by your donations!...
item.content:encoded: (no text)
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: We are always so grateful for everything we receive and this...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

We are always so grateful for everything we receive and this #GivingTuesday we want to highlight the work your donations have made possible this year. Watch this stunning video by Apryl Alexander to see some of our highlight reel.

We also want to reiterate that until Black Lives Matter Global Network is accountable to the #BLM10 and all other chapters that have been alienated from our collective that giving locally is your best option. We all see and try to answer calls to sh...op locally to help keep small businesses afloat this holiday season. We invite you to extend that awareness to include your charitable giving.

Happy #GivingTuesday2020 and thank you for all your support. We could not do any of this without you.

If you are unable to give, ‚ù§Ô∏èing this post and sharing our donation link goes a really long way in helping us meet our goals!

www.coloradogives.org/BlackLivesMatter5280

See MoreNow is the time to stand with our community. - by : Apryl A. - Denver, CO on 14 Oct 2020 (21341)

pbs.org

Now is the time‚Ä¶ by : Apryl A. - Denver, CO on 14 Oct 2020 (21341) - PBS American Portrait

item.title: It is time for accountability. #BLM10 ‚ÄúStatement From The...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

It is time for accountability. #BLM10

‚ÄúStatement From The Frontlines of BLM

It was recently declared that Patrisse Cullors was appointed the Executive Director to the Black Lives Matter Global Network (BLMGN) Foundation. Since then, two new Black Lives Matter formations have been announced to the public: a Black Lives Matter Political Action Committee, and BLM Grassroots. BLM Grassroots was allegedly created to support the organizational needs of chapters, separate from the ...

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280‚Äôs Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
